column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I consulted Yelp for the best Chicago deep dish pizza and Lou Malnati's was the answer. We came here on a Saturday night and it was packed
column2: which was expected. While you wait
column3: you can put in your pizza order
column4: since it takes a while to make
column5: so we did this. When we got seated (about 30 minutes later) our pizza was at our table the same time our beer arrived. We got the traditional Chicago pizza
column6: and it was everything I expected. Definitely worth a visit when in Chicago!
